::Autofire::

Autofire shruggs. "Some sort of Vok."

He looks around at the charred valley, remembering the battle in which Adrax 
and himself had killed each other.

"He told me we're here to help out the Predacon faction. I suggest we get 
going to their base. Many things have probably happened since our deaths."
